Sentencas: To achieve solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) at reduced costs, the atmospheric plasma spray (APS) process could be an attractive technique.
Titulo: Liquid plasma sprayed coatings of yttria-stabilized zirconia for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: However, to make dense and thin layers as needed for electrolytes, a suspension is preferably implemented as a feedstock material instead of a conventional powder.
Titulo: Liquid plasma sprayed coatings of yttria-stabilized zirconia for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Suspensions of yttria-stabilized zirconia particles in methanol have been prepared with various solid loadings and states of dispersion.
Titulo: Liquid plasma sprayed coatings of yttria-stabilized zirconia for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: An external injection system was used to ensure the atomization and radial injection of the suspension into the Ar-H-2 plasma under atmospheric conditions.
Titulo: Liquid plasma sprayed coatings of yttria-stabilized zirconia for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: The coatings morphologies were characterized by scanning electron microscopy, and their porosity was evaluated by the Archimedes method.
Titulo: Liquid plasma sprayed coatings of yttria-stabilized zirconia for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Differences in the microstructure of the deposits were observed depending on the APS operating conditions.
Titulo: Liquid plasma sprayed coatings of yttria-stabilized zirconia for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Special attention has been dedicated to assess the influence of the suspension as well as the injection on the layer morphology.
Titulo: Liquid plasma sprayed coatings of yttria-stabilized zirconia for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: For this purpose, the atomization has been investigated and efforts have been made to understand relationships among suspension properties, atomization, and coating microstructure.
Titulo: Liquid plasma sprayed coatings of yttria-stabilized zirconia for SOFC electrolytes
